Feature.Name: Potion of Water Breathing
Feature.Text: You can breathe underwater for 1 hour after drinking this potion. Its cloudy green fluid smells of the sea and has a jellyfish-like bubble floating in it.

MagicProperty.Name: Potion of Water Breathing
